description:
Your government cares about you!  That’s why mask wearing has been mandated.  That’s why we’re exposed to 82,000 unregulated chemicals, that’s why we have poisoned water in Flint and other locations, that’s why GMOs are not labeled and they are shot into the bloodstream of your children, that’s why we have fluoride in the water, and our meat is not fit for consumption in other countries, since it contains ractopamine and other dangerous chemicals and endocrine disruptors.
.

Don’t forget:  your government cares about you!  That’s why mask wearing, social distancing, contact tracing, lockdowns and other extraordinary police state measures were put into place.  To protect you from this virus, which has a 0.26% fatality rate.
.

Your government cares about you.  That’s why your jobs were eliminated, Main Street was destroyed, while Wall Street was propped up.  Out of the goodness of their heart, they gifted you $1,200, while giving banks and multi-national corporations Six Trillion Dollars of your tax dollars. .

Your government cares about you.  So, just wear your mask!
.
.
